introParagraph:
We are a charity based in Douglas in the Isle of man, but we work all over the island. We are here to help people who are in insecure accomodation and those affected by homelessness. Graih offers a range of services including a **Drop-In centre**, **Community Support** and an **Emergency Night Shelter**.

Graih adopts a non-judgemental approach to addressing homelessness issues. We support individuals ????.

openingHours.description: For those without overnight accomodation, the emergency night shelter is available for over 18s.

ourImpactDates: Statistics are taken over the time period 1st January 2019 to 31st December 2021.
